name: Force and Motion
description:
Force and Motion is a physics puzzle game where you apply your knowledge of real physics to solve puzzles in the game.

The game covers mechanics and kinematics content at the middle school level. As the game progresses, you will review the great achievements of mankind in exploring the physical laws of the world over the past few centuries.

The game simplifies the math as much as possible. There are no trick exercises here. As long as you master the application of physical laws and mathematical tools, you can enjoy swimming in the ocean of physics.
